name: AWSOpsWorksLayerLifeCycleConfigurationShutdownEventConfiguration
description: ShutdownEventConfiguration is a property of the AWS OpsWorks Layer LifeCycleConfiguration property that specifies the shutdown event configuration for a lifecycle event.

properties.name: DelayUntilElbConnectionsDrained
properties.desc: Indicates whether to wait for connections to drain from the Elastic Load Balancing load balancers.

properties.name: ExecutionTimeout
properties.desc: The time, in seconds, that AWS OpsWorks waits after a shutdown event has been triggered before shutting down an instance.
